question: The Supreme Court recently sacked Anurag Thakur and Ajay Shirke from their posts in BCCI. They served as
option1: Secretary and President of BCCI respectively
option2: President and Secretary of BCCI respectively
option3: President and Joint Secretary of BCCI respectively
option4: Vice President and Secretary of BCCI respectively
answer: President and Secretary of BCCI respectively
